thread.title: NYC mayor: Israel trip has 'extra meaning' amid violence
thread.title_full: NYC mayor: Israel trip has 'extra meaning' amid violence - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: NYC mayor: Israel trip has 'extra meaning' amid violence
text:
By JONATHAN LEMIRE
Associated Press NEW YORK (AP) - Bill de Blasio is embarking on a rite of passage for New York City mayors: a trip to Israel.
De Blasio is set to depart New York Thursday night and is scheduled to return on Sunday.
The mayor plans to meet with Israeli officials, visit sites like the Western Wall and deliver an address on anti-Semitism at a conference of mayors.
He also will visit Jewish and Palestinian students at a school in Jerusalem.
De Blasio is not meeting with any Palestinian officials on his trip.
The mayor said Thursday that the trip has taken on "extra meaning" in the light of recent violence in Israel.
A trip to Israel is a staple for New York mayors, who represent a large Jewish constituency.
